pages.text: Gives random Christmas items when opened$(br2)Drops:$(li)Coal (14.3%)$(li)Cake (4.8%)$(li)$(l:fourze/items/astroswitches#rocket_switch_christmas_ver)Rocket Switch (Christmas Ver.)$(/l) (4.8%)$(li)$(l:wizard/arsenal/wizard_rings#merry_christmas_ring)Merry Christmas Wizard Ring$(/l) (4.8%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/lockseeds#christmas_lockseed)Christmas Lockseed$(/l) (4.8%)$(li)$(l:drive/items/shift_cars#holy_christmas)Shift Holy Christmas$(/l) (4.8%)$(li)$(l:ghost/items/ghost_eyecons#santa_ghost_eyecon)Santa Ghost Eyecon$(/l) (4.8%)$(li)$(l:ex_aid/arsenal/energy_items#christmas_energy_item)Christmas Energy Item$(/l) (4.8%)
